scripts.build: rm -rf bin/bedrock-utils; mkdir bin/bedrock-utils; go build cmd/main.go ; mv main bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock; cp -rf modules/external bin/bedrock-utils/external
scripts.example-create: npm run build; bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock init test/example_create/create.toml
scripts.example-build: npm run build; bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock build test/example_build/build.toml
scripts.example-es6: npm run build; bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock build test/example_es6/build.toml
scripts.example-typescript: npm run build; bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock run test/example_typescript/build.toml
scripts.example-server: npm run build; bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock run test/example_server/server.toml
scripts.example-container-vagrant-vars: export BEDROCK_VAGRANT_IP=192.168.33.11; export BEDROCK_VAGRANT_PUBLIC_IP=192.168.2.100; export BEDROCK_VAGRANT_PROJECT_PATH=$(pwd)/test/example_container; export BEDROCK_VAGRANT_BEDROCK_PATH=$(pwd)
scripts.example-container-init: npm run build; bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock init test/example_container/server.toml
scripts.example-container-run: npm run build; bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock run test/example_container/server.toml
scripts.example-container-stop: npm run build; bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock stop test/example_container/server.toml
scripts.example-container-destroy: npm run build; bin/bedrock-utils/bedrock destroy test/example_container/server.toml
scripts.example-test-build-times-go: SECONDS=0; npm run example-build prod; echo "[example-go] $SECONDS secs" >> log/times.log
scripts.example-test-build-times-node: SECONDS=0; pushd test/example/node_build_comparison; npm run build prod; popd; echo "[example-node] $SECONDS secs" >> log/times.log
scripts.example-test-build-times: echo "[example] Start time test"; for i in {1..3}; do npm run example-test-build-times-go; npm run example-test-build-times-node; done; echo "[example] Time test ended"
